programme.title: The Last Dance

programme.title: The Last Dance

programme.title: The Last Dance

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: With Michael Jordan's extraordinary fame came extraordinary scrutiny, and in 1993, it all felt like it came to a head with the Chicago Bulls' pursuit of a third straight title shadowed by question marks about Jordan's gambling.

programme.title: The Last Dance

programme.title: 2025 Stanley Cup Final
programme.desc: The Panthers try to put a stranglehold on their Stanley Cup Final with the Oilers in this Game 4. Brad Marchand scored another key goal in Game 3, striking in the opening minute as Florida cruised to a 6-1 victory and a 2-1 series advantage.

programme.title: 2025 Stanley Cup Final
programme.desc: The Stanley Cup Final returns north, with the Oilers and Panthers playing Game 5 tied at 2-2. A seesaw duel saw Florida's Sam Reinhart send Game 4 to overtime with 20 seconds left, but Leon Draisaitl scored after 11 minutes for a 5-4 Edmonton win.

programme.title: 2025 Stanley Cup Final
programme.desc: The Panthers aim to claim their second straight Stanley Cup in Game 6 against the Oilers. Florida made an early 2-0 lead in Game 5 hold up for an eventual 5-2 victory over Edmonton. Brad Marchand scored the first and third goals for the Panthers.

programme.title: 2025 Stanley Cup Final
programme.desc: The defending Stanley Cup champion Panthers visit a familiar foe in the Oilers for Game 1 of the Stanley Cup Final. Florida makes its third straight trip to the final. The Panthers beat the Oilers in seven games in 2024 after leading the series 3-0.

programme.title: 2025 Stanley Cup Final
programme.desc: The Oilers try to press their advantage as they host the Panthers for Game 2 of the Stanley Cup Final. Leon Draisaitl's second goal of Game 1 came on the power play with 31 seconds remaining in the first overtime frame for a 4-3 Edmonton win.

programme.title: 2025 Stanley Cup Final
programme.desc: The 2025 Stanley Cup Final, tied at 1-1, takes the Panthers and Oilers to Florida for Game 3. After Corey Perry scored with 18 seconds left to tie the game, Brad Marchand broke hearts with his double-overtime tally to give Florida a 5-4 Game 2 win.
